title: Looking to make OR join a Star Guardian themed fun team/club
body: If you have a club or team I would like to be apart of it! If not and you're interested in creating one with me drop your name below and i'll invite you!

replies.body:
If you are looking for a club, Can I interest you in mine?

It's the RGMQ enthusiast, a club based on the Rotating game modes. A club I hope will help facilitate the creation of premade for events such as Invasion. 

Names Erockandroll, if your interested, come friend me and I will send you an invite.
I would like to join one as well. I am open to creating one if nobody is inviting.

> [{quoted}](name=Zezockary,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=cx8aNgQv,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-13T08:34:58.043+0000)
>
> I would like to join one as well. I am open to creating one if nobody is inviting.

Added
